sentences.en: a discussion of how the mind and body interrelate
sentences.cn: 关于精神和肉体相互联系的讨论

sentences.en: Affection , and intellect should interrelate, influence and restrict each other.
sentences.cn: 它们相互联系 、 影响和制约.

sentences.en: Each of these cells have their specific jobs to do, but they also interrelate with each other.
sentences.cn: 这些细胞都有各自的具体分工，但它们也相互联系。

sentences.en: I cannot interrelate these two events.
sentences.cn: 我无法把这两件事联系到一起.

sentences.en: Many would say that crime and poverty interrelate / are interrelated ( with one another ).
sentences.cn: 很多人都说犯罪与贫穷是密切相关的.

sentences.en: Reductionism and reduction method not only interrelate each other but also have essential differences.
sentences.cn: 还原论与还原方法既有联系又存在着质的差别.

sentences.en: Successful MNCs eventurely must learn how to interrelate their subsidiaries with the parent company.
sentences.cn: 成功的跨国公司必须最终学会如何协调母子公司之间的关系.

sentences.en: Teachers interrelate ideas and information within and across curricular areas to extend students'understanding.
sentences.cn: 教师使课程内部和外部概念和信息相互联系以拓展学生的理解.

sentences.en: The body and the mind interrelate.
This paper introduces the characteristics of the noise in radar receiver and its interrelate function.
sentences.cn: 介绍了雷达接收机噪声及其相关函数的特点.

sentences.en: We will be discussing how the interests of state, parent and child interrelate.
sentences.cn: 我们将讨论国家、父母和儿童之间的利益是如何相互关联的。

trans.tran_en: if two things interrelate, they are connected and have an effect on each other
